<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aura of Faith](/Feats.aspx?ID=5913) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
holy or unholy

</column>

---

You radiate an aura of belief that imbues your attacks and those of nearby allies with divine power. Each willing ally in your champion's aura adds the [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517) trait to their Strikes if you're holy or adds the [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) trait to their Strikes if you're unholy.
name: Aura of Faith
